0.text: Innate: Periodically, Poppy  throws her buckler as her next basic attack, which has  350 bonus range and deals 20 − 180 (based on level) bonus magic damage. The buckler then falls near the target after 1 second, where it remains for up to 4 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Poppy throws her buckler as her next basic attack, which has  350 bonus range and deals 20 − 180 (based on level) bonus magic damage. The buckler then falls near the target after 1 second, where it remains for up to 4 seconds.
markedPassages: throws
350 bonus range

1.text: Upon retrieving the buckler, Poppy  shields herself for  13 / 15.5 / 18% (based on level) of her maximum health for 3 seconds. If the buckler kills the target, it bounces back to Poppy automatically. Enemy  champions can step on the buckler to destroy it.
1.html: Upon retrieving the buckler, Poppy shields herself for  13 / 15.5 / 18% (based on level) of her maximum health for 3 seconds. If the buckler kills the target, it bounces back to Poppy automatically. Enemy champions can step on the buckler to destroy it.
markedPassages: shields
13 / 15.5 / 18% (based on level) of her maximum health

0.text: Active: Poppy smashes the area in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Against  monsters, the damage based on their maximum health is capped.
0.html: Active: Poppy smashes the area in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Against monsters, the damage based on their maximum health is capped.

0.content: 40 / 60 / 80 / 100 / 120 (+ 90% bonus AD) (+ 8% of target's maximum health)

1.content: 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 / 240 (+ 180% bonus AD) (+ 16% of target's maximum health)

markedPassages: monsters

1.text: The impact creates a field for 1 second that  slows enemies within, which then ruptures to deal the same physical damage.
1.html: The impact creates a field for 1 second that slows enemies within, which then ruptures to deal the same physical damage.
markedPassages: slows

0.text: Passive: Poppy increases her  total armor and  total magic resistance by 10%, doubled to 20% while she is below 40% maximum health.
0.html: Passive: Poppy increases her  total armor and  total magic resistance by 10%, doubled to 20% while she is below 40% maximum health.
markedPassages: total armor
total magic resistance

1.text: Active: Poppy gains  40% bonus movement speed and creates an aura around herself for 2 seconds, causing all enemies who attempt to  dash into or within it to be dealt magic damage, knocked up for 0.5 seconds and, if they were successfully interrupted,  grounded and  slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.
1.html: Active: Poppy gains  40% bonus movement speed and creates an aura around herself for 2 seconds, causing all enemies who attempt to dash into or within it to be dealt magic damage, knocked up for 0.5 seconds and, if they were successfully interrupted, grounded and slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: 40% bonus movement speed
dash
knocked up
grounded
slowed

2.text: Steadfast Presence can only block a single dash per enemy per cast.
2.html: Steadfast Presence can only block a single dash per enemy per cast.

0.text: Active: Poppy  dashes to the target enemy's location and, if they are in range upon arrival, she deals physical damage and  carries them along with her for up to 400 units.
0.html: Active: Poppy dashes to the target enemy's location and, if they are in range upon arrival, she deals physical damage and carries them along with her for up to 400 units.
markedPassages: dashes
carries

1.text: If the target hits terrain, she stops to deal the same physical damage again and  stuns them for a duration.
1.html: If the target hits terrain, she stops to deal the same physical damage again and stuns them for a duration.
markedPassages: stuns

0.text: Active: Poppy  charges while being  slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Keeper's Verdict's  range and  knockback distance over 0.5 seconds after the first 0.5 seconds of the channel. Keeper's Verdict can be recast at any time within the duration.
0.html: Active: Poppy charges while being slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Keeper's Verdict's  range and knockback distance over 0.5 seconds after the first 0.5 seconds of the channel. Keeper's Verdict can be recast at any time within the duration.
markedPassages: charges
slowed
range
knockback

1.text: Recast: Poppy releases the charge with a 0.25 seconds cast time, launching her hammer upwards to deal physical damage to enemies nearby and in an area in front of her,  knocking them up for 1 second.
1.html: Recast: Poppy releases the charge with a 0.25 seconds cast time, launching her hammer upwards to deal physical damage to enemies nearby and in an area in front of her, knocking them up for 1 second.
markedPassages: knocking them up

2.text: If Keeper's Verdict charged for at least 0.5 seconds, it deals 100% increased damage and  knocks back targets up-to 3400 units toward the enemy team's fountain. If no enemies are within the uncharged hitbox, Poppy instead sends a shockwave that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy  champion, causing a hammer to erupt. Enemies hit by the shockwave or the eruption receive the empowered effects.
2.html: If Keeper's Verdict charged for at least 0.5 seconds, it deals 100% increased damage and knocks back targets up-to 3400 units toward the enemy team's fountain. If no enemies are within the uncharged hitbox, Poppy instead sends a shockwave that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy champion, causing a hammer to erupt. Enemies hit by the shockwave or the eruption receive the empowered effects.
markedPassages: knocks back
champion

3.text: If the charge is  interrupted or completes without reactivation, Keeper's Verdict is cancelled and the ability is put on a  15-second cooldown.
3.html: If the charge is interrupted or completes without reactivation, Keeper's Verdict is cancelled and the ability is put on a  15-second cooldown.
markedPassages: interrupted
15-second

4.text: Enemies knocked  airborne are  revealed and are rendered  untargetable while being displaced if Keeper's Verdict charged for more than 0.5 seconds.
4.html: Enemies knocked airborne are revealed and are rendered untargetable while being displaced if Keeper's Verdict charged for more than 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: airborne
revealed
untargetable

Active: Poppy  dashes to the target enemy's location and, if they are in range upon arrival, she deals physical damage and  carries them along with her for up to 400 units.

If the target hits terrain, she stops to deal the same physical damage again and  stuns them for a duration.

origin: 40 / 60 / 80 / 100 / 120 (+ 90% bonus ad) (+ 8% of target's maximum health)
80 / 120 / 160 / 200 / 240 (+ 180% bonus ad) (+ 16% of target's maximum health)
